column1: The easiest way to collect this information is to search “bike racks in kitchener waterloo” and then find out their latitude and longitude by right-clicking the red-location marker and choosing “what’s here” option?
ALSO, if you can't find the latitude and longitude using the method given above, visit https://www.latlong.net/ and easily just type in the address to get the measurements!
